A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 2nd best in the entire series\, it will be hard for anything to top empire strikes back but i feel this movie comes close\, there is so much in this film and i can feel what disney is pushing for. when they keep bringing up letting the past go i feel its a reference to the eu\, even with the \"supposed\" destruction of the anicent text again i feel they are meant to represent the eu books. cant wait to see where they go in the next movie.
